snippet: The National Defense Authorization Act approved by the Senate promotes equitable treatment of women.
abstract: Editorial holds that the version of National Defense Authorization Act approved by Senate contains two important provisions promoting equitable treatment of women: lifting ban on abortion coverage for female service members in cases of rape and incest, and protecting Afghan women's rights after American troops withdraw; asserts that both measures merit retention in final bill being negotiated by House-Senate committee.
lead_paragraph: The National Defense Authorization Act approved by the Senate promotes equitable treatment of women.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
